name: Syros
description: Syros is a Greek island located in the Aegean Sea, known for its rich history, picturesque landscapes, and well-preserved architecture. The island's main town, Ermoupoli, is distinguished by its neoclassical buildings and vibrant cultural scene. You will enjoy working from a caf√© in the main square or directly in front of the sea. Plus, it's a very family friendly island.
